title: Super Bowl Preview: How Each Team Can Win | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We make the case for both the 49ers and the Chiefs to win the Super Bowl, touching on how to slow down Patrick Mahomes, what the 49ers can do offensively to keep up with the Chiefs, how motion will play a huge role in this game, how Travis Kelce will be defended, and the 49ers' offensive game plan. Then we offer our picks on who will win.
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
